ahana ahana hama mangulatama (manyo neweyi mama me kiwwe) mage udasina prathicharaya nisa ape siya yojana kala mawa dehiwala usas thakshana aayathanayata danna..onna ithin oya atamagaleta mawa ekkan giya...eeka oya kampas ekak nowunata eke ayiyala eka nilanolath kampas ekak koragenayi hitiye..mama giye kalamanakarana mokaddo ekakata..ithin palaweni dawase pawada dala piligena apita siniyarla awith dunna nethin kandulu kata watena hardayangama mewwa ekak..eyala kiwwa apiwa aaraksa korana eka eyalage wagakimakya ee nisa apata thaniyama widyala bhumiya athule araheta meheta yanna epaya kiyala..sahodara premaya kiyanne wiwekaye ath sodanna yaddith apiwa ekka giye polim hadawala prabhu aarakshawa madde...api ithin hena wi ayi pi hariya...ee asse apita ahenawa eha sekshanwala widuru kadenawa, dora janel dedaranawa, thuwalakarayo geniyanawa, sin godayi..ithin ape dayabara akkala ayiyala awith kiyanawa 'penawa neda nangi malli, umbaala ape podi un api umbaalata ehema karanne na' aadi wu noyekuth wal bayila..api ithin hari santhosen hitiya...
